message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product's value to me is significantly higher.  I could consider letting it go for $13,000.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to meet you at $13,000. I would like to propose $10,500 for the product.
